cause.description:
As everyone knows Ray Emory uses Huggies under his pads to allow himself to go number 1 or 2 or both every time an opposing player shoots on him.
1. Ray Emory needs more Huggies
2. Huggies should be worn by all black hockey playas
3. Huggies Should be worn on Ray Emory's helmet
cause.mission: Help Ray Emory stay Clean and Dry in the nets
cause.name: Help Ray Emory get Huggies for a Year
